New Zealand reassessing proposed overhaul of Antarctic baseNew Zealand is reassessing a proposed overhaul of its Antarctica base after negotiations with a construction firm reached a deadlock due to budget issues, the government agency responsible for the country's Antarctic operations said on Friday. Fri, 23 Feb 2024 03:21:39 GMT JU5BCJOQABM5FAGHVAUYOOQE64 https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/new-zealand-reassessing-propose-overhaul-antarctic-base-2024-02-23/Lucy Craymer世界亚太地区
Exclusive: Chinese police work in Kiribati, Hawaii's Pacific neighbourChinese police are working in the remote atoll nation of Kiribati, a Pacific Ocean neighbour of Hawaii, with uniformed officers involved in community policing and a crime database program, Kiribati officials told Reuters. Fri, 23 Feb 2024 03:17:33 GMT 4NU63SH775M4JNYXH6QWE665CE https://www.reuters.com/world/china/chinese-police-work-kiribati-hawaiis-pacific-neighbour-2024-02-23/Kirsty Needham世界中国
US achieves first moon landing in half century with private spacecraftA spacecraft built and flown by Texas-based company Intuitive Machines landed near the moon's south pole on Thursday, the first U.S. touchdown on the lunar surface in more than half a century and the first ever achieved by the private sector. Fri, 23 Feb 2024 02:58:55 GMT BIBVN6DGWZNQDNWNLOTKB427EI https://www.reuters.com/technology/space/us-achieves-first-moon-landing-half- century-with-private-spacecraft-2024-02-23/Steve Gorman, Joey Roulette技术空间
Armenia freezes participation in Russia-led security bloc - Prime MinisterArmenia has frozen its participation in the Russian-led Collective Security Treaty Organisation (CSTO) because the pact had failed the country, Prime Minister Nikol Pashinyan said in an interview broadcast on Thursday. Fri, 23 Feb 2024 02:41:06 GMT CG52VZ6BWVLOHNY56KOKH6AVPM https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/armenia-freezes-participation- Russia-led-security-bloc-prime-minister-2024-02-23/Reuters世界亚太地区
IMF, Ukraine reach staff agreement on next disbursement of $880 mlnOfficials from the International Monetary Fund and the Ukrainian government on Thursday reached a staff-level agreement on updated economic policies, paving the way to release about $880 million once approved by the IMF's board, the fund said. Fri, 23 Feb 2024 00:08:19 GMT LJTIENFKUJIG7P6O2PDU2ZPCBA https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/imf-ukraine-reach-staff-agreement-next-disbursement-880-mln-2024-02-23/Andrea Shalal世界欧洲
UK and EU to share intelligence on gangs trafficking migrants in new dealBritain will gain access to the EU's intelligence on criminal gangs involved in human trafficking as part of a deal with the bloc's border protection agency, Frontex, in another sign of closer cooperation between the two sides after Brexit. Fri, 23 Feb 2024 00:04:16 GMT AO2TL3VIZZMTLH5PE5PVC72DHU https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/uk-eu-share-intelligence-gangs-trafficking-migrants-new-deal-2024-02-23/Reuters世界欧洲
UK authorities seize 'biggest ever' cocaine shipmentBritish authorities said on Friday they had seized 5.7 tons of cocaine from a port in southern England, in what is believed to be the biggest ever seizure of Class A drugs in the UK. Fri, 23 Feb 2024 00:02:48 GMT 3O2LXDGPABNCHMFN637ODMIBDA https://www.reuters.com/world/uk/uk-authorities-seize-biggest-ever-cocaine-shipment-2024-02-23/Reuters世界英国
South Korea health alert raised to 'severe' over doctors walkoutSouth Korea raised its health alert to the highest level on Friday after a mass walkout by trainee doctors this week, while the prime minister said public hospitals would extend working hours to respond to growing strains on the medical system. Thu, 22 Feb 2024 23:34:20 GMT CX3C5HDXERPBHBLZ3DE5IUZMPE https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/south-korea-raises-health-alert-severe-over-protest-by-doctors-2024-02-22/Ju-Min Park, Jack Kim商业工作世界
Israeli negotiators to take part in new Gaza ceasefire talks, source and media sayIsrael will take part in negotiations this weekend in Paris with the U.S., Qatar and Egypt on a potential deal for a ceasefire and release of hostages in Gaza, according to a source briefed on the matter and Israeli media. Thu, 22 Feb 2024 22:42:08 GMT HM5C7SXY75K5NICLWIY6AU6KUU https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/israeli-negotiators-take-part-new-gaza-ceasefire-talks-source-media-say-2024-02-22/Ibraheemabu Mustafa, Nidal Al-Mughrabi, Jonathan Landay世界中东
US to impose sanctions on over 500 targets in Russia action on FridayThe action, taken in partnership with other countries, will target Russia's military industrial complex and companies in third countries that facilitate Russia's access to goods it wants, Deputy U.S. Treasury Secretary Wally Adeyemo said, as Washington seeks to hold Russia to account over the war and the death of opposition leader Alexei Navalny. Thu, 22 Feb 2024 22:34:20 GMT YHNOYNQA2BKJ3AZ24UQO2MOOWU https://www.reuters.com/world/us-impose-sanctions-over-500-targets-Russia-action-friday-2024-02-22/Daphne Psaledakis, Andrea Shalal, David Lawder世界
Debris from North Korean missile in Ukraine could expose procurement networksRevelations that a North Korean missile fired by Russia in Ukraine contained a large number of components linked to U.S.-based companies underline the difficulty of enforcing sanctions against Pyongyang, but could help uncover illicit procurement networks, experts say. Thu, 22 Feb 2024 22:20:56 GMT SP63WAQMO5KMNLH32ZOLRRGO7E https://www.reuters.com/world/debris-north-korean-missile-ukraine-could-expose-procurement-networks-2024-02-22/David Brunnstrom世界
